Title: Columbus
Writer: M.S. Raju (story and screen play), R. Samala (dialogue)
Actors: Sumanth Ashwin, Roshan Basheer, Murtaza Gandhi, Seerat Kapoor
Plot: Ashwin(Sumanth Ashwin) is a college going youth who falls in love with Indu(Mishti). As time passes by, Ashwin leaves all his career goals behind and lives life with only Indu's point of ...
